understanding_summary: Sparkle World is a mobile-first, whimsical React + TypeScript PWA for a 12-year-old audience, designed as a private 'digital grimoire'.
It is strictly local-first: no backend, no accounts, no tracking, and uses Dexie (IndexedDB) for persistence.
The app follows a plugin-like 'Realm' system driven by a central registry; shared state is provided via a React Context ('Magic Bridge').

Key features include Home (trophy room, owl prophecy, easter-egg hotspots, dragon egg hatch), Media (Archive.org discovery plus YouTube embeds and rewards), Diary (emoji-derived key encryption using Web Crypto and optional voice input), plus future Games and Crafts modules.
open_questions: Where are the referenced handover UI components (ArchWindow.tsx and Shelf.tsx) and the asset pack under public/ui/, and what are the canonical filenames?
What is the minimum supported browser set for V1 (especially for SpeechRecognition support and iOS constraints)?
What is the expected offline UX for Archive.org searches and YouTube embeds, and do we cache any metadata locally?
What are the initial local JSON contents for prophecies and riddles (quantity, tone boundaries, any banned themes)?
What is the initial Dexie schema versioning and migration approach for future changes (upgrade paths versus reset)?

complexity_level.justification: Single-frontend app with no backend, but moderate complexity from plugin-style architecture, encrypted diary with key derivation, PWA offline shell, and browser-dependent voice input behaviour.

stack_options.stack: React + TypeScript (CRA/CRACO), Tailwind, Dexie, Web Crypto, Web Speech API, PWA service worker
stack_options.tradeoffs: Matches the specification and handover constraints; CRA/CRACO is stable but slower than modern bundlers; acceptable for V1.

stack_options.stack: React + TypeScript (Vite), Tailwind, Dexie, Web Crypto, Web Speech API, PWA plugin
stack_options.tradeoffs: Faster dev/build loop; diverges from 'CRA/CRACO as per handover' and may cause rework if handover assumes CRA conventions.

draft_milestones.description: Implement the 'Cathedral' shell: layered background assets, BottomNav, Realm registry, and lazy-loaded realms wired to MagicContext.

draft_milestones.description: Dexie schema for stars, inventory, diary entry metadata, completion logs, timestamps (lastProphecy, lastRiddle). Load/save flows.

draft_milestones.description: Home realm trophy shelf, owl prophecy engine (24h), hotspot sequence unlocks, dragon egg hatch trigger when inventory is full.
draft_milestones.pass_criteria: Inventory updates shelf; prophecy changes after 24h; hotspot sequence unlocks items; hatch triggers at MAX inventory.

draft_milestones.description: Archive.org advancedsearch integration for books/audiobooks; YouTube embeds for videos; card UI with details; mark watched/read adds stars.
draft_milestones.pass_criteria: Search returns and displays results; marking content grants stars and persists; embeds are responsive and sandboxed.

draft_milestones.description: Emoji key derivation with PBKDF2; AES-GCM encrypt/decrypt diary entries; lock/unlock UX with no-recovery warning; voice input fallback.

draft_milestones.pass_criteria: Riddle gating works; attempt limitation enforced; reward persists; completion logs stored.

draft_milestones.pass_criteria: App shell loads offline; no horizontal scroll from 320px upwards; acceptable Lighthouse baseline; core UX usable on mobile.
